Topic.Title: Weird html glitch in forum posts

Posts.EditableText: I've just noticed that if you use any html in forum posts, such as span style, and then have cause to make an edit, you can't re-submit your edited post (it results in a big red "Sorry, you can't do that here." error message.
Posts.HTML: I've just noticed that if you use any html in forum posts, such as span style, and then have cause to make an edit, you can't re-submit your edited post (it results in a big red "Sorry, you can't do that here." error message.
